page.title: 12ATHERSLEY SCHOOLS VANDALISM.
page.content: Out of fifteen schools in the Athersley and Mapplewell area only two schools have not had broken windows and one school has had one hundred and forty four windows smashed. All the schools except three have some graffiti on outside walls and fences which have also been damaged. Broken glass has been found on school playgrounds at seven different schools. Plants and trees in the school grounds at two of these seven schools have been damaged. A few schools have had evidence of glue sniffers and all the schools complained about stray dogs wandering in the play areas.
